content:
It seems Vonk does not support a _filter search parameter, any ETC for that?
Also, if I want to define additional search parameters do I need to upload a single SearchParameter with all of them or can create multiple SearchParameter resources each describing a single parameter?

Hi Shamil, I've asked our developers and they do not have enough incentive to put the implementation of _filter on the planning, unfortunately I cannot give you an ETC. About the SearchParameter Resources: Yes, one SearchParameter resource per parameter is the way to go.
